Scripts.OnTextChanged: local scrollBar = getglobal(self:GetParent():GetParent():GetName().."ScrollBar") self:GetParent():GetParent():UpdateScrollChildRect(); local min; local max; min, max = scrollBar:GetMinMaxValues(); if ( max > 0 and (self.max ~= max) ) then self.max = max; scrollBar:SetValue(max); end

local scrollBar = getglobal(self:GetParent():GetParent():GetName().."ScrollBar") self:GetParent():GetParent():UpdateScrollChildRect(); local min; local max; min, max = scrollBar:GetMinMaxValues(); if ( max > 0 and (self.max ~= max) ) then self.max = max; scrollBar:SetValue(max); end
